::Battera::
She cried as Vulios shot at her again.  He got up from the throne and 
walked over to her, laughing,"Your no match for me!" as he kicked her 
in the stomach. She groaned and cried as he kept kicking her.

Her body twitched and jerked.

She pleaded to him,"Please, Vulois, I beg you, stop this. You forgave 
me once and.." she was cut short as he kicked her again. She groaned 
and layed on the floor, crying and begging.  Vulois just laughed and 
drew his gun again.  He shot her in the legs and laughed evily at her 
while she lay there, leaking and crying.  he kicked her again in the 
stomach and kicked her across the room.  He walked over to her, 
grabbed her leash and dragged her back to his throne.  He tied the 
leash to the arm of the throne and laughed, "You sniveling little 
coward. You will now the pain that I suffered.  You left me to die, 
now, it will be your turn."  Vulois stood up and stood next to 
her. "How shall I kill thee, let me count the ways." He took out a 
whip and started whipping her.  She felt the sting of the whip on her 
back and wings. The energon whip tore part of her wing and started 
cutting into her back.  She cried out with each crack of the whip. 
But Vulois continued.  He finally stopped as she lay there, almost 
unconsious.  He picked her up and slapped her in the face,"Wake up 
you pathetic little insect. I'm not done with you yet."  All she 
could do was cry from the pain and fear that she felt.
